identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.vibe: Sun-Drenched Heritage. Warm Luxury. Editorial Elegance.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Use italic variant for emphasis words.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, navigation, price tags.

accent.usage: Pull quotes, testimonials, 'Our Story' snippets. Use in italics.

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use 'primary' (#F9F8F6) for main page backgrounds. Use 'surface' (#FFFFFF) for cards to create subtle lift.
usage_rules.text: Never use pure black. Use 'primary' (#2D2A26) for headings. Use 'secondary' (#5C5852) for body.
usage_rules.buttons: Primary buttons: Solid #8B2E2E (Merlot). Secondary buttons: Outline #2D2A26.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures only.

textures.noise: Add a 2% noise overlay to the background to kill digital flatness.

grid_system.marketing: Use 'Bento' grid. Mix wide spans (col-span-8) with narrow spans (col-span-4). Avoid perfect symmetry.
grid_system.product_list: Grid of 3 or 4 columns. Gap-8 or Gap-12. Minimalist cards.
grid_system.spacing: Use generous padding. Section vertical padding: py-24 or py-32.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or very slight rounding (rounded-sm). Uppercase text. Wide tracking (tracking-widest).

cards.style: Flat, no border, transparent background (or white on off-white bg). Focus on the image.
cards.typography: Title in Serif (Playfair). Price in Sans (Manrope).

navigation.style: Sticky, glassmorphism. Logo centered. Links split left/right or minimal right alignment.
navigation.mobile: Full screen overlay menu with large serif typography.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end wine shop. The user wants 'HELL' (Light) theme. Do not make it dark. Do not make it boring.
instructions_to_main_agent.css_setup: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css. Set base background color to #F9F8F6.
instructions_to_main_agent.tailwind_config: Extend the theme with the colors provided. Add the font families.
instructions_to_main_agent.shadcn_customization: Override default Shadcn radius to 0 or 0.125rem. Change primary color to #8B2E2E. Remove default 'slate' grays and replace with warm 'stone' or custom greys.
critical_rules: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid.

universal_guidelines.motion: Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations (fade-up). Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met. Use semantic HTML.
universal_guidelines.code_style: Use functional components. Keep files small. Use 'lucide-react' for icons.
